Group makes DIY floating picnic table with outboard motor on Auckland’s Waitematā Harbour to watch SailGP https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/boys-make-diy-floating-picnic-table-with-outboard-motor-on-aucklands-waitemata-harbour-to-watch-sailgp/C3R6FJ4GTFEQTLU5MPPDCTSRJU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/boys-make-diy-floating-picnic-table-with-outboard-motor-on-aucklands-waitemata-harbour-to-watch-sailgp/C3R6FJ4GTFEQTLU5MPPDCTSRJU/ Raphael FranksA policeman on a jetski intercepted the group of men, took a photograph, and left.
